testsuite.name: io.cucumber.core.plugin.JUnitFormatter

testcase.classname: Verify Xealei Suites > Edit Suites Page
testcase.name: To verify the buttons functionality and error validation and info messages in Edit Suite Page

Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should verify the client code is addressed in tab url address in login screen.passed Then User should verify the 'LOGIN' text is displayed.......................passed Then User should verify that after landing on the login page the login button is disabled.passed Then User should verify the field label name and placeholder text for Email and Password fields.passed And User should enter password in password field............................failed Then User should verify that entered password is **hide.....................skipped And User should click the eye icon in the Password field....................skipped Then User should verify that entered password is Unhide.....................skipped Then User should verify the copy rights "Powered by Alphind © 2024" text is displayed.skipped
